name: Gertrud Lönegren-Jerkman
biography: She studied at the Technical School in Stockholm and the Kunstgewerbeschule in Vienna.  She worked at St. Erik's Lervarufabrik in Uppsala 1932-36.  Durimng the years 1936-41 she worked at Rorstrand in Lidkoping.  Designed both utility and art pottery in earthenware and stoneware.
